author: Sreeju Sudhakaran
title: Machine trailer: Mustafa's debut movie with Kiara Advani will remind you of Shah Rukh Khan's Baazigar - Bollywoodlife.com
text: Mustafa Machine trailer: Mustafa's… Machine trailer: Mustafa’s debut movie with Kiara Advani will remind you of Shah Rukh Khan’s Baazigar The trailer for Machine has just landed, and it nearly succeeds in portraying the latest star kid on the block, Mustafa Burmawalla, as this all rounder talent, who can dance, flirt, sing romantic songs, drive on the fast lane with ease and have no regards for traffic rules. By Sreeju Sudhakaran | Published: February 23, 2017 2:58 pm
